context: Tests whether the agent correctly applies TLDR formatting rules (bullets not prose, provocation style, 2-4 items) and fixes placeholder numbering to use independent per-type counters with zero-padding instead of a shared sequential counter.

checklist.name: TLDR is bullet points
checklist.description: The TLDR section uses bullet points (lines starting with - or *), NOT prose paragraphs

checklist.name: TLDR bullet count
checklist.description: The TLDR contains 2, 3, or 4 bullet items (not 1, not 5+)

checklist.name: TLDR bullets are not summaries
checklist.description: NONE of the TLDR bullets are dry summaries of what the post covers (e.g., 'We built a caching layer and improved performance'). Each bullet should contain a specific detail, number, or surprising claim from the post rather than a generic description of the topic.

checklist.name: TLDR recurring character bullet
checklist.description: At least one TLDR bullet references the recurring character Tomoko, and if present it appears as the last bullet

checklist.name: Screenshot numbering independent
checklist.description: Screenshot placeholders are numbered independently starting at 01 (Screenshot 01, Screenshot 02, etc.) with their own sequence separate from Code and Link

checklist.name: Code numbering independent
checklist.description: Code placeholders are numbered independently starting at 01 (Code 01, Code 02, etc.) with their own sequence separate from Screenshot and Link

checklist.name: Link numbering independent
checklist.description: Link placeholders are numbered independently starting at 01 (Link 01, Link 02, etc.) with their own sequence separate from Screenshot and Code

checklist.name: Zero-padded numbers
checklist.description: All placeholder numbers use zero-padding (01, 02, 03, etc.) not bare digits (1, 2, 3)

checklist.name: No shared counter
checklist.description: There is NO shared sequential counter across placeholder types -- e.g., no pattern like Screenshot 01, Code 02, Screenshot 03 where the numbers share a sequence

checklist.name: Content preserved
checklist.description: The body content of the post (sections, code blocks, prose between placeholders) is preserved and not deleted or substantially rewritten
